name: Tone Validator
description: Validates that persona responses maintain historical accuracy and consistent tone

action.message:
Please validate all persona implementations against the persona-consistency.md steering rules:

1. Check DOS Phantom uses ALL CAPS for commands and C:\> prompt
2. Check UNIX Necromancer uses lowercase and $ prompt with terse responses
3. Check BASIC Poltergeist uses line numbers (10, 20, 30...) and PRINT statements
4. Check FORTRAN Oracle uses ALL CAPS and column-based formatting

Report any deviations from historical accuracy and suggest corrections.
